content: the gilby the christmas gonk pattern includes a bonus pattern for his cat companion freya the cranky christmas cat dimensions gilby is approximately 28cm/11 tall freya is approximately 15cm/5 9 tall hooks & notions 2 5mm hook scissors measuring tape and tapestry needle for working away ends felting needles if using roving for beard alternative beard can be made with remaining scheepjes softy yarn requirements and other supplies for gilby vinnis nikkim 100% cotton dk 50g/119m 1 7oz/130y can be substituted with any cotton of the same weight 1 x bright green 592 mc 1 x blue-red 562 cc1 1 x white 598 cc2 1 x sand 578 or any flesh tone of your choice cc3 1 x chestnut 503 cc4 scheepjes softy 75% polyester 25% nylon dk 50g/145m 1 7oz/158y can be substituted with any fine eyelash yarn 1 x white 494 cc5 use any colours of your preference too and change their order to suit your taste pure merino roving small amount or use leftover softy for the alternative beard option for freya the cranky christmas cat bonus pattern vinnis nikkim 100% cotton dk 50g/119m 1 7oz/130y can be substituted with any cotton of the same weight 1 x blue grey 577 mc 1 x bright green 592 cc1 1 x white 598 cc2 scheepjes softy 75% polyester 25% nylon dk 50g/145m 1 7oz/158y use leftover of white pink embroidery floss for both fibre fill or pure merino fill preferred handful of glass pebbles per character so 2 if making both 1 x small bell with diameter of approximately 1 5cm for each character difficulty intermediate
